name: Postcard
description:
Have you ever entered another world through a postcard? Now you have a chance!
  • Three minigames, each one has prize!
  • More then 60 levels!
  • Interactive objects and secrets!
  • Collect all prizes and open 'new game+'!

Write your comments!
  

To open "new game+" press Ctrl+N
(it's recommended to play usual game mode first)
